page.title: 17 ARMITAGE SHANKS COMPANY.
page.content: Armitage Shanks started out as two companies, "Armitage Ware" and "Shanks and Company" then they became "Armitage Shanks"- it's modern day name. They make different types of sanitary ware, wash basins, baths, toilets, soap and toothbrush holders, and shower trays. The factory is sited by the Trent and Mersey canal, this was useful at first when roads were poor. Materials and products were transported by barge. The raw materials used in production are china and normal clay. After the mix has been put in the mould and has been "fixed" it is glazed and painted My dad is a kiln fireman, he watches the kilns and contents to make sure everything is alright. The Company has bought a piece of land by our school to build a new warehouse
